Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ClientSocketMessageCLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientSocketMessage
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientSocketMessageCLI
public class ClientSocketMessageCLI
extends ClientSocketMessage
Cass created to manage ClI Game: interacts with ClientCLIMain It inherits from abstract ClientSocketMessage class

    • readFromServerCLI

      public java.lang.Thread readFromServerCLI()
      Overrides:
      readFromServerCLI in class ClientSocketMessage
      Returns:
      Thread in reading Thread that parses input from Server. Server sends a MoveMessage in response of a PlayerMove during game, MoveMessage contains board that is printed and if a player wins or loses quitGame method is called and this Thread ends.

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard​(SetWorkerPosition o)
      Overrides:
      updateBoard in class ClientSocketMessage
      Parameters:
      o - Method used to setting initial worker positions

    • writeToServer

      public void writeToServer()
      Thread used in writing. It is always listening on this client and, after checking that the client has entered the right input, sends a PlayerMove or a PlayerMoveEnd to Server.

    • checkInputStandard

      public boolean checkInputStandard​(java.lang.String message) throws java.io.IOException
      Input check
      Parameters:
      message - input move string
      Returns:
      true if client has entered a standard input
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If client ended his turn a PlayerMoveEnd is sent to Server

      Returns:

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver​(PlayerColor color)
      Parameters:
      color - Method called when game is over, It checks * if this client player has won or lost

    • gameOverStuck

      public void gameOverStuck​(PlayerColor color)
      Parameters:
      color - Method called when game is over for player stuck, It checks if player stuck is this client player or not

    • quitGame

      public void quitGame()
      Method called at the end of a game to close connection and to close Threads

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Returns:
      true if reading Thread is still active

    • isActiveWrite

      public boolean isActiveWrite()
      Returns:
      true if writing Thread is still active

    • closeOrWatchGame

      public void closeOrWatchGame()
      It is called when this player has lost and it gives the option to stay to watch the game or close the connection
